name: Jaws Shark Attack - Blocky Hunter Multi Skin Uploader for Minecraft Edition
name_original: Jaws Shark Attack - Blocky Hunter Multi Skin Uploader for Minecraft Edition
description:
Sharks are attacking your Block City! Invite your friends play in multiplayer and be the hero who save the city against the evil sharks! This is your war!
Push back the shark attack waves and craft your weapons!

Features:
- Craft weapons
- Advanced Multiplayer system. Invite friends to unleash hell!
- Fast paced third person rogue like game!
